remarks: Transitive law for chained less-than and less-than-or-equal. ( ~ psssstr analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
statement:
pltletr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pltletr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pltletr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
pltletr $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .< Y /\ Y .<_ Z ) -> X .< Z ) ) $.
